primary_analysis.reasoning: Last 20–30 candles show a clear series of higher highs/lows (bullish). Price has accelerated upward with larger green candles and rising volume — a breakout continuation. Nearest actionable support comes from the recent consolidation just below current price (core area 4135–4155). Session context aligns with London/New York overlap and momentum supports a short scalping BUY on pullback to this tight support zone.

entry_analysis.reasoning: Visible bullish breakout/continuation candles that pushed price through the 4135-4155 15-min zone (clear overlap). The move occurred ~10-20 candles ago (still relevant but not an immediate last-5 candles entry), so wait for a pullback into the tight zone (4135-4155) or a fresh near-term confirmation before scalping.
